about_the_game:
Hollow Mine is a climatic fast paced roguelike hack-and-slash dungeon crawler game with crafting and mining elements.

Become a hero who was assigned with a task. Go deep into the mine and destroy evil artifact.



Dive yourself into this challenging adventure inside a Hollow Mine. Fight challenging bosses and various enemies. Explore this exciting game with lots of weapons, magic, abilities and classes. Every session brings a new adventure, discover new and fun ways to deal with the enemies each time.

Features


  • Engage in action-packed combat with a variety of weapons.
  • Dig for resources to craft weapons, spells, and potions.
  • Explore randomly generated, destructible rooms.
  • Level up and pick from more then 50 abilities.
  • Use the environment creatively to defeat enemies.
  • Fight unique enemies and bosses in different biomes.
  • Enjoy quick 30-minute play sessions.
  • Find loot like weapons, magic scrolls, jewelry, and herbs in chests.
  • Pick from three character classes with different play styles.
  • Take on fun challenges in various rooms.
  • Experience hand-crafted pixel art world.
  • Collect gold to buy or sell items from NPCs.
  • And much more!


Warrior - Master of melee weapons, excelling in close combat, possess expertise in hand-to-hand combat is unrivaled, making him a formidable force during the combat.


Ranger - Archery art master, known for exceptional long-range marksmanship with bows and arrows.


Mage - Master of magic arts, wielding mystical powers to inflict devastating damage.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Hollow Mine is an action roguelite that combines mining, crafting, and intense 2D top-down combat. Explore unpredictable, ever-changing mines, battle fierce enemy hordes, and confront tough bosses. Engage, die, learn, and repeat as you uncover new challenges with every run.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
